Class ChatServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatServer
  • public class ChatServer
extends java.lang.Object
    ChatServer is the main server application for the multi-client chat system. It listens for incoming client connections on a specified port and manages all connected clients through ClientHandler threads.

    Key features:

    • Accepts multiple simultaneous client connections
    • Broadcasts messages to all connected clients
    • Supports private messaging between users
    • Maintains a list of active clients
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    ChatSystem Team
    See Also:
    ClientHandler

        public ChatServer()

    • Method Detail

      • getClients

        public static java.util.List<ClientHandler> getClients()
        Gets the list of all connected clients.
        Returns:
        the list of ClientHandler instances representing connected clients

      • addClient

        public static void addClient​(ClientHandler client)
        Adds a new client to the list of connected clients. This method is called when a new client successfully connects.
        Parameters:
        client - the ClientHandler instance to add

      • removeClient

        public static void removeClient​(ClientHandler client)
        Removes a client from the list of connected clients. This method is called when a client disconnects.
        Parameters:
        client - the ClientHandler instance to remove

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast​(java.lang.String message,
                             ClientHandler sender)
        Broadcasts a message to all connected clients except the sender.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to broadcast
        sender - the ClientHandler of the sender (will not receive the message)

      • sendPrivateMessage

        public static void sendPrivateMessage​(java.lang.String senderName,
                                      java.lang.String targetName,
                                      java.lang.String msg,
                                      ClientHandler sender)
        Sends a private message from one user to another. Only the target user receives the message, along with a confirmation to the sender.
        Parameters:
        senderName - the username of the sender
        targetName - the username of the recipient
        msg - the message content
        sender - the ClientHandler of the sender

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method that starts the chat server. Creates a ServerSocket and continuously accepts incoming client connections. Each client connection is handled by a new ClientHandler thread.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments (not used)
